org.stekikun.dolmen.tagged

Class Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.tagged.Encoder

  • public final class Encoder
extends Object
    An instance of Encoder can be used to encode syntactic regular expressions in tagged regular expressions.

    All regular expressions encoded within the same instance share a common pool of character sets, which can be retrieved via getCharacterSets().

    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer

    • Method Detail

      • getCharacterSets

        public List<CSet> getCharacterSets()
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable view of the character sets recorded by this encoder, suitable for interpreting character set indices in tagged regular expressions encoded by this

      • encode

        public TRegular encode(Regular regular,
                       Set<String> charVars,
                       int action)
        Parameters:
        regular - the regular expression to encode
        charVars - bound variables guaranteed to be matching single characters
        action - the semantic action associated to this regular expression
        Returns:
        a tagged regular expression corresponding to the given regular expression regular. Character sets in the resulting expression are encoded in this encoder
        See Also:
        getCharacterSets()
